content.description: Start standing on the small cheater stone that is between Weenie Roast and the Mantle. Reach out right and find the good hold on the lip. Put your feet on and go right to the corner above Crystal Arete and up. The first few moves are the crux. This is a fun line, who knows it probably has a sit start. Go have a look!
content.location: Weenie Traverse is on the northwest side of the Campfire Circle boulder between Weenie Roast and Crystal Arete.

content.description:
Start up a short slab, make contorted moves over a small roof to slopers and finish up an arete. Tough for the grade. An easy downclimb exists on the west side of the boulder just right of the

Crystal Arete

.
content.location: Just right of the Weenie Arete.

content.description:
Starting from the sandy wash grab a large sidepull and sloper and pull up and into a scoop to reach for a distant edge. Reel it in and finish up the flared corner to top it out. An easy downclimb exists on the west side of the boulder just right of the

Crystal Arete

.

Sit start with a high pinch on the arete, get your feet sorted and then work up the arete to a gritty jug and finish with an easy topout. An easy downclimb exists on the west side of the boulder just right of this problem.

Fun moves on rough and unique rock - it would get another star if it wasn't so sharp.

Jump for the lip and press it out - nothing fancy on this one. Easy downclimb on the west side of the boulder. An easy downclimb exists on the west side of the boulder just right of the

Crystal Arete

.
content.location: Right of center on the north face.
